paronyan.name: paronyan
paronyan.paragraph: This project reveals the very essence of luxury. We filled it with individual design and ergonomic solutions, in a perfect combination of aesthetics and functionality. Each room has its unique details, palette, and mood. A dining table made of natural oak with an antique vibe, a kitchen island reminiscent of modern art, accent finishes with a liquid metal effect — everything here attracts the eye and makes the interior aesthetic and memorable.
